title: Star studded Hekari FC favoured
body_text:
THE Grand-final stage is set for the Womenâ€™s National Soccer League this Saturday at the PNG Football Stadium.
Defending champions Hekari United FC will face off against Lae City Dwellers, the last time both teams met was in 2023 and Hekari put Dwellers away with a 4-0 win.
